name: Hemingway
description: The famous bar of a thousand stories. The place for discerning Parisians to settle down amongst the deep leather armchairs and discreet conversation and lose themselves in our nightly live jazz.

name: Proust
description: Here, dishes are made for sharing, at lunch or dinner, with a glass of exceptional wine. Decorated with elegant woodwork, the bar welcomes guests for breakfast starting at 8am and remains open for a nightcap until 2am.
